title: 在用ChestCommand插件的COMMAND指令时报错！
author: ESCesc
txt_content:
如题！！！ 图片： QQ图片20160128124334.png (19.35 KB, 下载次数: 0) 下载附件 2016-1-28 12:45 上传 配置信息：
w28358:
  NAME: '购买VIP'
  ID: 57
  DATA-VALUE: 0
  AMOUNT: 1
  LORE:
    - '点击购买'
  KEEP-OPEN: false
  PRICE: 0
  POINTS: 3000
  LEVELS: 0
  COMMAND: 'op:givevip {player} vip 31'
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 1
复制代码

replies.author: 云闪
replies.txt_content: 请更换最新版PlayerPoints插件(或者你降cc的版本也行)

replies.author: ESCesc
replies.txt_content: 红色的那个图片没用，那是别的插件的！

replies.author: TRely
replies.txt_content:
op:后面要加空格
COMMAND: 'op: kill <player>'
